# Sample Project Plan - E-commerce Platform

## Overview
Build a modern e-commerce platform with frontend, backend API, and database integration.

## Phase 1: Frontend Development
- [ ] Implement React components for product catalog
- [ ] Create shopping cart with state management
- [ ] Design checkout flow with form validation
- [ ] Add responsive UI for mobile devices

## Phase 2: Backend API
- [ ] Design RESTful API endpoints
- [ ] Implement authentication and authorization
- [ ] Create database models and migrations
- [ ] Add API rate limiting and error handling

## Phase 3: Testing & Deployment
- [ ] Write unit tests for critical functions
- [ ] Set up integration tests for API endpoints
- [ ] Configure CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Deploy to production environment

## Documentation
- [ ] Write API documentation
- [ ] Create user guides
- [ ] Document deployment process

## Tasks Requiring Specialized Tools
- Need to review code for security vulnerabilities
- Frontend design and UI/UX improvements
- Database schema optimization
- Performance testing and optimization
